reference.title: cxxUnionTemplateParameters
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxUnionTemplateParameters> element contains a set of union parameters.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxUnionTemplateParameters> element contains one or more <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> elements. Each of which describes a union parameter. <cxxUnionTemplateParameters> is declared within <cxxUnionDefinition>

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxUnionTemplateParameters> <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> <cxxUnionTemplateParameterType>typename T</cxxUnionTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the first function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxUnionTemplateParameter> <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> <cxxUnionTemplateParameterType>typename U</cxxUnionTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the second function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxUnionTemplateParameter> </cxxUnionTemplateParameters>
